# Archive child campaigns

Outlines steps to archive a child campaign in Zuora, including launching Promotion Codes, navigating to the Campaigns tab, managing the target campaign, selecting Archive, and confirming the action.

Take the following steps to archive a child campaign:

1.  Launch Promotion Codes from your Zuora tenant.
2.  In the Campaigns tab, locate the campaign that includes the target child campaign, and click ![check_icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0eaf7384-7420-48e7-9f41-71bb82dfb981?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..a43N52oN96PjJ0cI_N-k4h5lPibc9psTo7HWR1MA3RU) to enter the homepage of the campaign.
3.  Scroll to the bottom of the campaign homepage, locate the child campaign that you want to archive, and click ![Manage icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0eaf7384-7420-48e7-9f41-71bb82dfb981?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..EOs4KAz_JMG9y4xhTJjTTZZHvNOgTA2aPfNi4GgGhTI) on the left.
4.  Select Archive from the menu.
5.  In the confirmation dialog, click OK . Additionally, set the Effective To date of the new promo code to deactivate the promo code from its parent campaign effectively.
